snippet: The District of Columbia Board of Elections is initiating an investigation after an advocate against voter fraud began the process of voting under Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr.’s name.
abstract: District of Columbia Board of Elections initiates investigation after advocate against voter fraud James O'Keefe began the process of voting under Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr’s name in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The District of Columbia Board of Elections is initiating an investigation after an advocate against voter fraud began the process of voting under Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr.’s name.

headline.main: Activist’s Undercover Videos on Rules for Voter IDs Lead to an Investigation
headline.print_headline: Activist’s Undercover Videos On Rules For Voter Ids Lead To An Investigation
